encounters.text: The courier finds a tottering bell-tower in sunset wheat fields; inside, a trembling monk illuminates what he claims is the last verse of Charlemagne's coronation psalm.

outcome.diary: Gold leaf catches the dying sun.
The monk gratefully hands you a relic scrap.

options.option: Steal the vellum after the monk sleeps

outcome.diary: The stairs collapse as you flee with the vellum.

encounters.text: A burning longship on a frozen inlet; three shield-maidens search the ice for their jarl's sword and chant in Old Norse.

outcome.diary: You melt snow for broth as the chant echoes.

success.diary: You surface clutching a frost runed blade.

outcome.diary: You leave the ceremony behind.

encounters.text: A lone Andalusi engineer studies ruined Roman arches and mutters about pressure gates.

outcome.diary: The engineer sketches a hydraulic pump.

options.option: Ask him to mend your waterskin

outcome.diary: Your waterskin holds more than before.
You pry loose rusted clamps, drawing resentful eyes.

encounters.text: A jet-black hound with ember eyes guards a stone carved with both runes and chi-rho.

outcome.diary: The dog falls in beside you.

fail.diary: A dark omen chills your bones.

outcome.diary: You whisper a humble prayer.

encounters.text: A corpse wagon in grey fog, a beaked doctor asking for iron to buy quicklime.

outcome.diary: Mercy buys you a blessing.

success.diary: You cough in the rising dust.

outcome.diary: The doctor thanks you for your grace.

encounters.text: Underground crystal pipes still drip pristine water beneath a mosaic of a six-armed sun.

success.diary: Your barrels brim with crystal water.

outcome.diary: A shard of Roman tech glints in your hand.
Visions of a distant path flood your mind.

encounters.text: A mathematician flies a silk kite to map enemy lines.

fail.diary: The wind drags you over rocks.

outcome.diary: You pack the shimmering silk.
Your report earns quiet gratitude.

encounters.text: A hollow oak hums; wax tablets filled with prayers are jammed into its bark.

outcome.diary: Villagers leave food in thanks.

success.diary: A new word settles on your tongue.

outcome.diary: Sticky resin coats your hands.

encounters.text: A shattered brass astrolabe lies in a ditch under bright stars.

outcome.diary: Gears click as the astrolabe whirs.
Molten brass pools at your feet.
You note the stars for a return.

encounters.text: A pale mailed woman stands on a bridge of light offering white and black feathers.

outcome.diary: A calm strength fills your limbs.
Dark resolve steels your heart.
The valkyrie nods toward distant shadows.

encounters.text: On a moonless night the courier reaches a glass-still bog where vapour rises like columns. In the water floats a disc of polished bronzeâ€”unblemished, impossibly bright, clearly Roman workmanship yet humming with faint tonal overtones.

options.option: Cup some water and clean the mirror

outcome.diary: The surface reveals a wrong star-map.
You feel a damp chill cling to you.

options.option: Gaze at your reflection until dawn

outcome.diary: Dawn breaks with secrets of Vert.

encounters.text: Within a collapsed Carolingian chapel twelve stone effigies stand in a circle; hollow throats house bronze pipes. A silent boy lights taper-candles between them then gestures for you to blow into any statue.

outcome.diary: Echoes dislodge old choir stalls.
Your breath resounds among the statues.

options.option: Smash a pipe free for scrap

outcome.diary: Stone collapses with a ghostly sigh.

encounters.text: A one-eyed falconer in Andalusi silks waits atop a shattered Roman milestone; his bird clutches a parchment tube. He offers to release the falcon toward any distant node but demands payment in secrets, not coin.

outcome.diary: The falcon soars with your confession.

options.option: Trade a relic scrap as a 'secret'

outcome.diary: He rewards you with field provisions.
The falcon watches you intently.

encounters.text: In a limestone sinkhole, mirrored shards form a ceiling that projects starlight into subterranean alcoves filled with scroll tubes. The air smells of myrrh and ozone.

outcome.diary: Hours pass under shifting constellations.
Sharp edges glitter in your pack.

options.option: Light a fire and scorch the place

outcome.diary: Smoke curls as heresy burns.

encounters.text: An iron suspension bridge spans a gorge; when wind blows the hanging links emit organ-like chords in a minor key. A hermit scrapes inscriptions into the deck, claiming each note represents a prophecy.

outcome.diary: The vibrations settle into your bones.

options.option: Carve your own name into the deck

outcome.diary: Your name sings with the bridge.
Metal groans as you pry it loose.

encounters.text: At low tide a bronze bell the size of a hut lies on its side amid kelp; Nordic runes overlay Latin numerals. A gull-feather quill and inkpot sit on a driftwood altar inviting a new glyph.

outcome.diary: Your mark angers the sea breeze.

options.option: Trace the hidden numerals for study

outcome.diary: You decipher intriguing decimals.

encounters.text: Deep forest hush: a metallic stag, joints ticking, grazes on fallen leaves. Its flank bears the sigil of the Architects.

options.option: Approach with calm and touch its nose

outcome.diary: The stag's gears whirr softly.

options.option: Fire an arrow to bring it down

outcome.diary: Metal parts scatter into the brush.

options.option: Shadow the stag for an hour

outcome.diary: It leads you to a hidden path.

encounters.text: An orchard of yews cut into star shapes; sap glitters like gold dust. A blind woman tends them, insisting each tree remembers a fallen empire.

outcome.diary: Sticky sap coats your hands.

options.option: Ask for guidance to distant shrine

outcome.diary: Her blessing wards off sickness.

encounters.text: Two perfectly spherical marble rooms share a thin slit. Your whispered words re-emerge a heartbeat later in another language. Graffiti lists Latin to Norse to Arabic chains.

outcome.diary: The chamber repeats you thrice over.
Your voice booms in alien tongues.
Fragments clatter at your feet.

encounters.text: On a ruined manor's roof a bronze rooster weather-vane rotates though the air is still; a translucent child stands beside it, pointing to the cardinal points. Lightning flickers though skies are clear.

options.option: Turn the vane to North as asked

outcome.diary: A calm hush follows the turning.

options.option: Ask the child what it seeks

outcome.diary: The child fades with a whisper.

options.option: Climb up to steal the vane

outcome.diary: You slip but keep hold of the vane.

encounters.text: A sun-leaned hermit emerges from a rocky hollow, offering cool jars of water to travellers willing to trade spare gear.

outcome.diary: The hermit blesses your path.
He nods, drinking deeply from one jar.

options.option: Steal a jar while he prays

outcome.diary: You flee with water as the hermit curses.
